overview: 1992 reunion concert with The Edmonton Symphony Orchestra and Da Camera Singers to mark the 20th anniversary of Procol Harum's legendary 1972 concert album. A video of the complete show was shown only once, on Canadian pay-per-view television.  This video is the edited version, subsequently also shown on Canadian pay-per-view TV but with Homburg, Whaling Stories, Shine On Brightly and King of Hearts edited out.
title: Procol Harum Live: Edmonton Reunion
